title: TechRadar Pro, Residential Systems, and TWICE announce CES Picks 2021 winners
author: techradar-pro
summary: See which companies took home this year's awards!
article: TechRadar Pro, Residential Systems, and TWICE are proud to announce the winners of this year’s Picks Awards, the brands’ annual program honoring the best and most influential consumer technology at CES 2021.

TechRadar Pro News and Features Editor Mike Moore said of the winners, "In what was a new look CES for many reasons, these companies all stood out from the competition in offering something unique and designed to help us all adjust to the new way of working and living. Congratulations to all the winners - hopefully see you all in person at CES 2022!"
